statements: SELECT * FROM menu_items;
SELECT item_id, item_name, price FROM menu_items;
SELECT item_name, price, item_id FROM menu_items;
SELECT * FROM menu_items ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM menu_items WHERE price > 10;
SELECT * FROM menu_items WHERE price > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM menu_items WHERE price < 5 OR price > 20 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM menu_items WHERE price BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY price ASC, item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM menu_items WHERE item_name LIKE 'Vegetarian%' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT COUNT(item_id) AS total_items, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM menu_items;
SELECT * FROM menu_items;
SELECT item_name, price FROM menu_items WHERE price > 10;
SELECT item_id, item_name, price FROM menu_items ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, total_price FROM orders JOIN menu_items ON orders.item_id = menu_items.item_id;
SELECT order_id, item_name, total_price FROM orders JOIN menu_items ON orders.item_id = menu_items.item_id WHERE total_price > 50;
SELECT item_name, price FROM menu_items WHERE price > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY total_price ASC
SELECT item_name, total_price FROM menu_items INNER JOIN orders ON menu_items.item_id = orders.item_id WHERE quantity >= 3
SELECT item_name, total_price FROM menu_items LEFT JOIN orders ON menu_items.item_id = orders.item_id WHERE total_price <= 50
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders
SELECT * FROM menu_items;
SELECT item_name, price FROM menu_items ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_name='Alice';
SELECT item_name, price FROM menu_items WHERE price < 10;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, price FROM menu_items WHERE price > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_name = 'John' ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT oi.order_id, oi.item_id, oi.quantity, mi.item_name FROM order_items oi JOIN menu_items mi ON oi.item_id = mi.item_id WHERE oi.quantity > 2 ORDER BY oi.order_id;
SELECT oi.order_id, oi.item_id, oi.quantity, mi.item_name FROM order_items oi JOIN menu_items mi ON oi.item_id = mi.item_id WHERE mi.price < 15 ORDER BY oi.quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM menu_items;
SELECT item_name, price FROM menu_items WHERE price > 20;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, quantity, total_price FROM orders WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY total_price ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_id FROM order_history WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_name, price FROM menu_items ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT item_name, total_price FROM menu_items JOIN orders ON menu_items.item_id = orders.item_id WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY total_price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM customers JOIN order_history ON customers.customer_id = order_history.customer_id ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_price) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN order_history ON customers.customer_id = order_history.customer_id JOIN orders ON order_history.order_id = orders.order_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM MenuItems
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM MenuItems
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM MenuItems
SELECT * FROM MenuItems WHERE item_category = 'Appetizer'
SELECT * FROM MenuItems ORDER BY item_price DESC
SELECT * FROM MenuItems WHERE item_category = 'Appetizer';
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM MenuItems WHERE item_price > 15 ORDER BY item_price DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM MenuItems WHERE item_price BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM MenuItems WHERE item_name LIKE '%burger%';
SELECT item_category, AVG(item_price) AS avg_price FROM MenuItems GROUP BY item_category HAVING AVG(item_price) > 12;
